name: Slime Hunter
description:
SLIME HUNTER

CONTROLS

Press the Arrow keys to move.

Press "a" to move and interact. Also to start the game. press a for a fun time.

press "1,2,3 or 4" to increase or decrease screen size.

pres "esc" to quit

SLIMY THINGS

The Slime Kings dirty little children have escaped and its up to you to bring them back to the Supreme Ones elected officials for a reward. Reward may or may not be conversation.

Catch the slimes in your net and offer them up to your friendly neighborhood Herald.

OTHER THINGS

now the jam is complete we shall continue to update as we find time and hopefully implement all the things we didn't have time for during the jam. such as slime names and an advanced slime inventory management system! and other polish.
